assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: From the Ministry of Health and the Ministry of Education, Jamaica.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All students were given letters for the parents allowing exclusion from blood tests. All participation of the students was voluntary.

assertion.value: Approved by the Southern Region Health Authority of the Ministry of Health, Jamaica.
